Then \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add shall\add* a \w measure|strong="H5429"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \add be sold\add* for a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, and two \w measures|strong="H5429"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* for a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

Then a \w lord|strong="H7991"\w* on whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w leaned|strong="H8172"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \add if\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* would \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w windows|strong="H0699"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, might this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* be? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add* with thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, but shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft a lord…: Heb. a lord which belonged to the king leaning upon his hand\f*

¶ And there were \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* at the entering \w in|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, Why \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* we here until we \w die|strong="H4191"\w*?

If we \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, then the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \add is\add* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and we shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* there: and if we sit \w still|strong="H3427"\w* here, we \w die|strong="H4191"\w* also. Now therefore \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* unto the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*: if they save us \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, we shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; and if they \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* us, we shall but \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And they rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w*, to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*: and when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the uttermost \w part|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, behold, \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* there.

For the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* had made the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* a \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and a \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \add even\add* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w host|strong="H2428"\w*: and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, Lo, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* against us the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us.

Wherefore they \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* in the \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w*, and \w left|strong="H5800"\w* their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and their \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, even the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* as it \add was\add*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* for their \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

And when these \w lepers|strong="H6879"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the uttermost \w part|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* thence \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w raiment|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \add it;\add* and came \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* thence \add also\add*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \add it\add*.

Then they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, We \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not well: this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of good \w tidings|strong="H1309"\w*, and we hold our \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*: if we \w tarry|strong="H2442"\w* till the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, some \w mischief|strong="H5771"\w* will \w come|strong="H4672"\w* upon us: now therefore \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, that we may \w go|strong="H0935"\w* and \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft some…: Heb. we shall find punishment\f*

So they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \w porter|strong="H7778"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*, and, behold, \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* there, neither \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, but \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w tied|strong="H0631"\w*, and \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* \w tied|strong="H0631"\w*, and the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* as they \add were\add*.

And he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*; and they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* to the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, I will now \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* you what the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to us. They \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that we \add be\add* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*; therefore are they gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w hide|strong="H2247"\w* themselves in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When they come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, we shall \w catch|strong="H8610"\w* them \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, and \w get|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let \add some\add* \w take|strong="H3947"\w*, I pray thee, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* of the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w*, which are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in the city, (behold, they \add are\add* as all the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in it: behold, \add I say\add*, they \add are\add* even as all the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* that are \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*:) and let us \w send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft in the city: Heb. in it\f*

They \w took|strong="H3947"\w* therefore \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.

And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them unto \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: and, lo, all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add was\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, which the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* had cast \w away|strong="H7993"\w* in their \w haste|strong="H2648"\w*. And the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w spoiled|strong="H0962"\w* the \w tents|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*. So a \w measure|strong="H5429"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* was \add sold\add* for a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, and two \w measures|strong="H5429"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* for a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* the \w lord|strong="H7991"\w* on whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* he \w leaned|strong="H8172"\w* to have the charge of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w trode|strong="H7429"\w* upon him in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, as the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, who \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to him.

And it came to pass as the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Two \w measures|strong="H5429"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* for a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, and a \w measure|strong="H5429"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* for a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, shall be to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*:

And that \w lord|strong="H7991"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Now, behold, \add if\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* should \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w windows|strong="H0699"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, might such a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* be? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* it with thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, but shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.
And so it fell out unto him: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w trode|strong="H7429"\w* upon him in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.
